title: Mastery 7 Elise
body: Has anyone, I repeat, ANYONE gotten Mastery Level 7 Elise the Spider Queen?? Just asking cause I am literally 1 S away from achieving Mastery level 7 on Elise that I have mained since Season 3 when she was first released. I just want to know if anyone else other than me is or as achieved getting Mastery level 7 on Elise.

replies.body: I went 24/1/9 with 122cs in a 34 min game... S- {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}  How did any1 get lvl 7?
Late comment, but your assists should've been higher, you don't want to get the kills yourself, you gotta help teammates and get a few kills yourself
I do. It was pretty easy for me, but I only play Elise mid, so I dunno how hard it is in the jungle.

I am mighty jealous of you sir! i am so close and all my past games that I have played as Elise, I have only gotten S- and thats for the past 30 games! I have done some calculations and if I get 100cs plus 10+ kills 5- deaths and 10+ assists I can achieve an S but most times I have played games where people just surrender and I don't know if that increases my rankings or it just puts it at where it should be, and winning a game with out surrender will get me higher than an S-
You'll get it eventually I suppose. Just gotta wait for those stomp games where the win kinda lands in your lap. I think the system might be harder on you since jungle is her intended role.

well my past few games i get great kills and great assists but its just the CS is a bit difficult in jungle cause most times its great to counter jungle but its mostly hard to when you are so squishy early game
